data.eml:eml: A new species of Medicorophium Bousfield, M. longisetosum n. sp. from the western Mediterranean, coast of Spain

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Myers, Alan A., De-La-Ossa-Carretero, Jose Antonio, Dauvin, Jean-Claude (2010): A new species of Medicorophium Bousfield, M. longisetosum n. sp. from the western Mediterranean, coast of Spain. Zootaxa 2450: 53-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.195185
